title: Even if There’s Love?
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Uwaaaaaaaah! I can’t! I’m done for~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>W-, what’s wrong, Chika-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Look at my score for this test.... If I let Mito-nee see this.... it’ll be the end of the world for me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>This is certainly.... worse than my score the other day....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I-, it’s nothing, never mind! Umm, you know, Chika-chan. Honoka-san told me this, but when someone scolds you, it’s because they expected you to do better. She said that it’s a form of love. So you don’t need to feel down even if you get scolded!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>A form of love....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Love! That’s why you should be brave and show it to her!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Even if there’s love, it’s still depressing to get scolded, I don’t want that~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>W-, what should Ruby do.... Help me, Honoka-san....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
